text: The Fog is a 1980 American horror movie directed by John Carpenter. It is set in California. It stars Adrienne Barbeau, Jamie Lee Curtis, Tom Atkins, Janet Leigh, and Hal Holbrook. It was released to positive reviews on February 1, 1980. A remake was made in 2005. == Other websites == * Category:1980 horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies directed by John Carpenter Category:American independent movies Category:1980 independent movies
title: The Fog
